reviews.text: Arrived at 11.30pm after a Ryanair flight from Liverpool This hotel is immediately across the road from the arrivals hall at Skavsta airport and it was a very welcome sight.
reviews.title: Little Gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Modern bright airy glass structure with high ceilinged reception / Living room area where free tea/coffee is available 24 hours a day and other drinks and snacks may be bought.This area has large sofas and coffee tables for people to sit and chat.There are two impressive glass lifts and two sets of stairs to access the bedrooms.
reviews.title: Hotel OK - but study connections

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are very comfortable and vary in size from dormitory accommodation with shared bathroom facilities to rooms with flat screen TV and en-suite wet rooms.
reviews.title: Convenient but hopeless and unfinished!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The triple glazing ensures quietness and the air conditioning is very efficient, added to this the large beds complete with mattress toppers and good quality linen meant we had a wonderful nights sleep.
reviews.title: Very convenient stay!
